00052   switch(format) {
00053   case matrix_format::MC_MR:
00054     return new SGD<DistMat>(this->comm, this->lr, this->momentum, this->decay, this->nesterov);
00055   case matrix_format::CIRC_CIRC:

00057   case matrix_format::STAR_STAR:
00058     return new SGD<StarMat>(this->comm, this->lr, this->momentum, this->decay, this->nesterov);
00059   case matrix_format::STAR_VC:
